name: dom-practice
description: Veggie Pizza is a pizza delivery outlet that became popular for its custom-made vegetarian pizzas. A customer can order pizzas and other items by calling the outlet. The outlet delivers the order to the address specified by each customer.​ The outlet now have an app that allows the call operator to enter the order details and store them.​ Write a JS program to create an order form with validations, to add order items dynamically, to save the order details ​and calculate the total bill amount payable.​
